div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 598px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 362px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 62px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(67, 97, 238), rgb(121, 147, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(58, 86, 212), rgb(134, 158, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# journalctl (systemd logs)
journalctl -f # Follow logs
journalctl -u nginx # Service logs
journalctl --since today
journalctl -p err # Errors only
journalctl --disk-usage # Check size
# Traditional logs
/var/log/syslog # System messages
/var/log/auth.log # Authentication
/var/log/dmesg # Kernel messages
/var/log/apt/ # Package manager
# Log rotation
logrotate /etc/logrotate.conf
logrotate -f /etc/logrotate.d/nginx

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 452px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(114, 9, 183), rgb(255, 169, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 8, 150), rgb(255, 180, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 378px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffd166;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#ffd166, #5d3600); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 228px; height: 1px; padding-top: 122px; margin-left: 378px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
â”Œâ”€ minute (0-59)
â”‚ â”Œâ”€ hour (0-23)
â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€ day of month (1-31)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€ month (1-12)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”Œâ”€ day of week (0-6)
â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚ â”‚
* * * * * command

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 222px; margin-left: 378px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Examples:
0 5 * * * Daily at 5 AM
*/15 * * * * Every 15 minutes
0 0 * * 0 Every Sunday
0 0 1 * * First of month
crontab -e # Edit user crontab
crontab -l # List crontab
sudo crontab -e # Root crontab

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 872px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(233, 69, 96), rgb(255, 115, 138)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(199, 62, 84), rgb(249, 131, 150));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 773px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# User management
sudo useradd -m username
sudo passwd username
sudo usermod -aG sudo username
sudo userdel -r username
# SSH hardening
/etc/ssh/sshd_config:
PermitRootLogin no
PasswordAuthentication no
Port 2222
# Firewall (UFW)
sudo ufw enable
sudo ufw allow 22/tcp
sudo ufw status numbered

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 365px; margin-left: 62px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(6, 214, 160), rgb(0, 136, 89)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(5, 181, 135), rgb(0, 151, 111));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 402px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #1a1a2e;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# rsync (incremental)
rsync -avz --delete /src/ /dest/
rsync -avz /data/ user@remote:/backup/
# tar (archive)
tar -czvf backup.tar.gz /data
tar -xzvf backup.tar.gz
# Backup script example
#!/bin/bash
DATE=$(date +%Y%m%d)
tar -czvf /backup/data_$DATE.tar.gz /data
find /backup -mtime +30 -delete

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# Resource monitoring
top / htop # Process monitor
free -h # Memory usage
df -h # Disk usage
du -sh /path # Directory size
iostat # I/O statistics
vmstat # Virtual memory
# Network monitoring
ss -tuln # Listening ports
netstat -an # Connections
iftop # Network traffic
# System info
uptime # System uptime
uname -a # Kernel info
lscpu # CPU info

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 365px; margin-left: 872px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 209, 102), rgb(93, 54, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(230, 188, 92), rgb(108, 72, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 402px; margin-left: 773px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #1a1a2e;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# Permission structure
rwx rwx rwx
â”‚ â”‚ â””â”€â”€ others
â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ group
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ owner
# Numeric values
r=4 w=2 x=1
chmod 755 file # rwxr-xr-x
chmod 644 file # rw-r--r--
# Ownership
chown user:group file
chgrp group file
# Special permissions
chmod u+s file # SetUID
chmod g+s dir # SetGID
chmod +t dir # Sticky bit
